duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through B2B sales and activities that drive outcomes and follow-through.
Prioritize opportunities, manage touch points, and engage in face-to-face networking to grow the sales portfolio.
Spend most of the time in the field having critical business discussions about solving business owners' problems with promoting and selling products and services.
Run point on maintaining client relationships for future revenue growth and renewal.
Bring concepts to life and sit at the top of the leaderboard with compelling, provocative communication skills.
Training in all things publishing and provided support in high-performance sales.
